# Zenith

A fully customizable Astro template for creating web and PDF resume.

## Features

To decide if Zenith is the right template for you, check

[![What is Zenith](https://img.shields.io/badge/what_is_zenith-059669?style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://zenith-docs.pages.dev/start-here/what-is-zenith)

## Documentation

To learn how to setup and customize your resume, read

[![Read the documentation](https://img.shields.io/badge/documentation-2563eb?style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://zenith-docs.pages.dev/start-here/getting-started)

To see a web and PDF resume with all sections used, look at

[![Check the example resume](https://img.shields.io/badge/example_resume-7c3aed?style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://zenith-resume.pages.dev/)
